publications.title: All-in-One:
publications.abstract: We present ProG, a unified library and theory for prompting over graphs and hypergraphs, with practical adapters and formal guarantees.
publications.bibtex: @inproceedings{sun2023prog, title={All-in-One: A Unified Graph Prompting Library}, author={Sun, Xiangguo and Others}, booktitle={KDD}, year={2023}}
